Great Opportunity to live in a Brand new Spacious 687 sqf big 1 Bedroom + Living Room Condo at Yonge / Steeles West. 9 Feet Ceiling, 6F, High end renovation. This Unit offers a great layout and plenty of Natural Light. Features include an En-suite Washer and Dryer, famous brand new Stainless Steel Fridge, Stainless Steel Stove, Stainless Steel Built-in Dishwasher, Stainless Steel Microwave, Granite Counter Tops, full 4 pieces washroom, Totally 3 closets include master bedroom one, and have Parking spot underground. This unit is big enough for a small family.

It is conveniently located steps from TTC and YRT, close Highway 404 and 401, Yorkdale Mall and York University. The building offers plenty of deluxe amenities such as Top End Gym, and much more. It is a must see!

Please:

Available Now, 2012. Students are welcomed, also Suitable for young couple family, prefer long term tenant.
